column4: Does anyone have experience with getting wireless devices working under ubuntu?
first thing type uname -r in a terminal then install the linux-restricted-modules-kernelversion you have
copy and paste this into a terminal dont type it: sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-`uname -r`

or open synaptic (the add remove programs) and search for the package restricted-modules you want the one that matches your kernel version (which you get by typing uname -r in a terminal and hitting enter)
